posts.message:
[align=center][img]http://min.us/ie10I.png[/img][/align]

Welcome everyone, to the weekly edition of HF News. The edition you are currently reading is the 23rd FULL edition. It is for the dates of 10/23/2010 to 10/30/2010. To read any older HF News, please go [url=http://hackforums.net/forumdisplay.php?fid=162]here[/url].

[align=center][IMG]http://min.us/icFot8.png[/IMG][/align]
This week on Hack Forums has been a week of difficulty, change and new occurrences.

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=47360]Saged[/url], a Former Staff member has been reinstated to his aforementioned position. He is the newest edition to the Forum team. We would like to wish him the best of luck with his new Staff position and we hope that he holds up his position with pride.

[color=#1E90FF][b]You can read more about this [url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=811161]here[/url].[/b][/color]

[align=center]**[color=#1E90FF]**[/color]**[/align]

In other news, Soldier of Fortune has sadly been demoted from the Forum Management team. He has been removed due to unknown reasons, although many speculate that it was due to his inactivity. We would like to wish him the best of luck on his future endeavors, he was an asset to the team.

[color=#1E90FF][b]You can read more about this [url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=806857]here[/url].[/b][/color]

[align=center]**[color=#1E90FF]**[/color]**[/align]

In other news, Hack Forums has been subject to numerous issues regarding uptime and server issues. Omniscient has stated that this won't be resolved until a new dedicated server is purchased, he has estimated the price of that single server to be of $300 USD. Bringing the total up to $800 a month. 

[color=#1E90FF][b]You can read his post [url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=805047&pid=7601002#pid7601002]here[/url].

You can also check out the issues that occur due to the database issues [url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=815006]here[/url][/b][/color]

[align=center]**[color=#1E90FF]**[/color]**[/align]

HF News has also taken a change this week. It seems apparent that The Elite has opened a new HF News Crew. This seems to still be in development due to the non-recruitment sign. We would like to wish the HF News Crew the best of luck.

[color=#1E90FF][b]You can read the thread [url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=799449]here[/url].[/b][/color]

[align=center]**[color=#1E90FF]**[/color]**[/align]

HF Ub3rs have been surprised with a brand new update and feature which they can use. It's called Negative Reputation Log. Only Ub3r members can view this page.

[color=#1E90FF][b]You can read the thread [url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=811622]here[/url].[/b][/color]

[align=center][IMG]http://min.us/icAP7c.png[/IMG][/align]

This week on Hack Forums, Solidify has been banned due to his controversial threads in regards to the Staff team. Omniscient does not seem to be happy with this and Solidify has suffered a one month ban.

[color=#1E90FF][b]You can read the thread [url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=804347]here[/url] and [url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=805566]here[/url].[/b][/color]

[align=center]**[color=#1E90FF]**[/color]**[/align]

In shocking news, Mia has been [b]permanently[/b] banned by Factor8â„¢. No one is sure of the reasoning behind this, members may never know though.

[align=center]**[color=#1E90FF]**[/color]**[/align]

Manga has recently posted a horrific thread stating that he/she is committing suicide due to recent tragic events in their life. We all hope that this thread is of a comical nature, although no one truly knows.

[color=#1E90FF][b]You can read more about this [url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=815289]here[/url].[/b][/color]

[align=center][IMG]http://min.us/ieZ6M.png[/IMG][/align]

This week, Hack Forums Tinychat ( www.tinychat.com/hackforums ) has been unbanned. 

You can read more about this [url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=814419]here[/url].

[align=center]**[color=#1E90FF]**[/color]**[/align]

Omniscient is angry due to the amount of people criticizing Staff and their roles and actions on Hack Forums. As a result, he has posted a thread explaining his prospective on the issues.

[color=#1E90FF][b]You can read the thread [url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=817057]here[/url].[/b][/color]

[align=center]**[color=#1E90FF]**[/color]**[/align]

I appreciate you reading it and apologize for no interview, I've been extremely busy. Check back next week for the next edition of HF News.
posts.subject: [11/07/2010] - HF News
